SA11n1129:4: punaraparaṃ kulaputra bodhisattva evaṃ kāye smṛtimupasthāpayati- ayaṃ kāyaḥ pādapādāṅgulijaṅghorutrikodaranābhipṛṣṭhavaṃśahṛdayapārśvapārśvakāhastakalācībāhvaṃsagrīvāhanulalāṭaśiraḥkapāla-mātrasamūhaḥ karmabhavakārakopacito nānākleśasaṃkalpavikalpaśatasahastrāṇāmāvāsabhūtaḥ |
SA11n1129:15: punaruktam- ayaṃ kāyo na pūrvāntādāgato na parānte saṃkrānto na pūrvāntāparāntāvasthito'nyatrāsadviparyāsasaṃbhūtaḥ kārakavedakarahito nādyantamadhye pratiṣṭhitamūlaḥ,
SA11n1129:25: asārako'yaṃ kāyo mātāpitṛśoṇitaśukrasaṃbhūto'śucipūtidurgandhasvabhāvo rāgadveṣamohabhayaviṣādataskarākulo nityaṃ śatanapatanabhedanavikiraṇavidhvaṃsanadharmā nānāvyādhiśatasahastranīta iti ||
SA11n1129:26: āryaratnacūḍe'pyāha- anityo batāyaṃ kāyo'cirasthitiko maraṇaparyavasāna iti jñātvā na kāyahetorviṣamayā jīvati |
SA11n1129:31: so'nityaḥ kāya iti sarvasattvānāṃ dāsatvaśiṣyatvamabhyupagamya kiṃkaraṇīyatāyai utsuko bhavati |
SA11n1129:32: anityaḥ kāya iti sarvakāyadoṣavaṅkaśāṭhayakuhanāṃ na karoti |
SA11n1129:33: anityaḥ kāya iti jīvitenāśvāsaprāpto jīvitahetorapi pāpaṃ karma na karoti |
SA11n1129:34: anityaḥ kāya iti bhogeṣu tṛṣṇādhyavasānaṃ na karoti |
SA11n1129:36: punaraparaṃ kulaputra bodhisattvaḥ kāye kāyānudarśanasmṛtyupasthānaṃ bhāvayan sarvasattvakāyāṃstatra svakāya upanibadhnāti |
SA11n1129:37: evaṃ cāsya bhavati- sarvasattvakāyā mayā buddhakāyapratiṣṭhānapratiṣṭhitāḥ kartavyāḥ |
SA11n1129:41: vīradattaparipṛcchāyāmapyuktam- yaduta ayaṃ kāyo anupūrvasamudāgato'nupūrvavināśo paramāṇusaṃcayaḥ śuṣira unnāmāvanāmī navavraṇamukharomakūpastrāvī valmīkavadāśīviṣanivāsaḥ |
SA11n1129:73: evaṃvidhaṃ kāyamacaukṣarāśiṃ rūpābhimānī bahu manyate yaḥ |
SA11n1129:74: prajñāyamānaḥ sa hi bālabuddhiḥ viṣṭhāghaṭaṃ yāti vahan vicetāḥ ||
SA11n1129:75: pūyaprakāraṃ vahate'sya nāsā vaktraṃ kugandhaṃ vahate sadā ca |
SA11n1129:76: cikkāstathākṣṇoḥ krimivacca jantoḥ kastatra rāgo bahumānatā vā ||
SA11n1129:77: aṅgāramādāya yathā hi bālo ghṛṣyedayaṃ yāsyati śuklabhāvam |
SA11n1129:78: yāti kṣayaṃ naiva tu śuklabhāvaṃ bālasya buddhirvitathābhimānā ||
SA11n1129:79: evaṃ hi yaścaukṣamatirmanuṣyaḥ caukṣaṃ kariṣye'hamidaṃ śarīram |
SA11n1129:81: tathā- prabhaṅguraḥ prastravan bodhisattvena kāyaḥ pratyavekṣitavyo navavraṇamukhairyāvat |
SA11n1129:90: tatraiva jñeyam- vedanāsmṛtyupasthānaṃ tu yathā tāvadāryaratnacūḍasūtre- iha kulaputra bohisattvo vedanāsu vedanānupaśyanāsmṛtyupasthānaṃ bhāvayan veditasukhāśriteṣu sattveṣu mahākaruṇāṃ pratilabhate |
SA11n1129:91: evaṃ ca pratisaṃśikṣate- tatsukhaṃ yatra veditaṃ nāsti |
SA11n1129:103: yadā aduḥkhāsukhāṃ vedanāṃ mohacariteṣu satyeṣu mahākaruṇāṃ pratilabhate,
SA11n1129:121: āryākṣayamatisūtre'pyuktam- duḥkhayā vedanayā spṛṣṭaḥ sarvapāpākṣaṇopapanneṣu sattveṣu mahākaruṇāmutpādayati |
SA11n1129:133: yathā bodhistathā hyeṣā śāntā śuddhā prabhāsvarā ||
SA11n1129:135: citasmṛtyupasthānaṃ tu yathā āryaratnakūṭe- sa evaṃ cittaṃ parigaveṣate- katarattu cittam?
SA11n1129:136: rajyati vā duṣyati vā muhyati vā?
SA11n1129:140: cittaṃ hi kāśyapa nādhyātmaṃ na bahirdhā nobhayamanteraṇopalabhyate |
SA11n1129:148: cittaṃ hi kāśyapa māyāsadṛśamabhutaparikalpanayā vividhāmupapattiṃ parigṛhṇāti |
SA11n1129:151: cittaṃ hi kāśyapa dīpārciḥsadṛśaṃ hetupratyayatayā pravartate |
SA11n1129:153: cittaṃ hi kāśyapa ākāśasadṛśamāgantukaiḥ kleśairupakliśyate | pe |
SA11n1129:155: cittaṃ hi kāśyapa pāpamitrasadṛśaṃ sarvaduḥkhasaṃjananatayā || pe |
SA11n1129:157: cittaṃ hi kāśyapa matsyabaḍiśasadṛśaṃ duḥkhe sukhasaṃjñayā |
SA11n1129:164: cittaṃ hi kāśyapa gandhārāmaṃ varāha ivāśucimadhye |
SA11n1129:166: cittaṃ hi kāśyapa sparśārāmaṃ makṣikeva tailapātre |
SA11n1129:167: cittaṃ hi kāśyapa parigaveṣyamāṇaṃ na labhyate |
SA11n1129:170: yannopalabhyate tannaivātītaṃ na anāgataṃ na pratyutpannam |
SA11n1129:175: āryaratnacūḍasūtre'pyāha- sa cittaṃ parigaveṣamāṇo nādhyātmaṃ cittaṃ samanupaśyati,
SA11n1129:189: tadyathā- na tayaivāsidhārayā saivāsidhārā śakyate chettum,
SA11n1129:191: naiva cittena tadeva cittaṃ śakyate draṣṭum ||
SA11n1129:195: dūraṃgamacāriṇo'śarīrasya laghuparivartino viṣayalolasya ṣaḍāyatanagocarasya aparāparasaṃprayuktasya cittasyāvasthānāmekāgratā aśaraṇamaviśaraṇaṃ śamathaikāgratā avikṣepaḥ,
SA11n1129:206: dharme dharmānudarśīṃ viharan bodhisattvo na kaṃciddharmaṃ samanupaśyati ||
SA11n1129:207: yato na buddhadharmā yato na bodhiḥ |
SA11n1129:208: yato na mārgo yato na niḥsaraṇaṃ sa sarvadharmāniḥsaraṇamiti viditvā anāvaraṇaṃ nāma mahākaruṇāsamādhiṃ samāpadyate |
SA11n1129:209: sa sarvadharmeṣu sarvakleśeṣu ca kṛtrimasaṃjñāṃ pratilabhate |
SA11n1129:215: na rāgabhāvo na dveṣabhāvo na mohabhāvaḥ |
SA11n1129:218: āryaratnacūḍe'pyuktam- iha kulaputra bodhisattvasya dharme dharmānupaśyanāsmṛtyupasthānena viharata evaṃ bhavati- dharmā evotpadyamānā utpadyante |
SA11n1129:220: na punaratra kaścidātmabhāve sattvo vā jīvo vā janturvā poṣo vā puruṣo vā pudgalo vā manujo vā,
SA11n1129:221: yo jāyate vā jīryate vā cyavate votpadyate vā |
SA11n1129:228: tādṛśāḥ samudāgacchanti kuśalā vā akuśalā vā āniñjyā vā |
SA11n1129:231: tatraivāha- sa kiyadgambhīrānapi dharmān pratyavekṣamāṇastāṃ sarvajñatābodhicittānusmṛtiṃ na vijahāti ||
SA11n1129:235: saṃskāra pralopadharmime varṣakāli calitaṃ va lepanam |
SA11n1129:241: hetubhi ca pratyayebhi cā sarvasaṃskāragataṃ pravartate |
SA11n1129:242: anyonya pratītya hetutaḥ tadidaṃ bālajano na budhyate |
SA11n1129:243: yatha muñja pratītya valbajaṃ rajju vyāyāmabalena vartitā |
SA11n1129:244: ghaṭiyantra sacakra vartate teṣvekaikaśu nāsti vartanā ||
SA11n1129:247: bījasya sato yathāṅkuro na ca yo bīja sa caiva aṅkuro |
SA11n1129:248: na ca anya tato na caiva tat evamanuccheda aśāsvata dharmatā ||
SA11n1129:249: saṃskāra avidyapratyayāḥ te ca saṃskāra na santi tattvataḥ |
SA11n1129:250: saṃskāra avidya caiva hi śūnya ete prakṛtīnirīhakāḥ ||
SA11n1129:252: na ca tatra na caiva sānyato evaṃ saṃskāranucchedaśāśvatāḥ ||
SA11n1129:254: na ca cakṣuṣi rūpa niśritaṃ rūpasaṃkrānti na caiva cakṣuṣi ||
SA11n1129:255: nairātmyaśubhāśca dharmime te punarātmeti śubhāśca kalpitāḥ ||
SA11n1129:258: akahiṃci gatamanāgataṃ śūnya māyopama yogi paśyati ||
SA11n1129:260: iti pratyayato'gni jāyate jātu kṛtakārya laghunirudhyate ||
SA11n1129:261: atha piṇḍatu kaści mārgate kutayamāgatu kutra yāti vā |
SA11n1129:262: vidiśo diśi sarva mārgato na gatirnāpyagatiśca labhyate ||
SA11n1129:263: skandhāyatanāni dhātavaḥ tṛṣṇa avidyā iti karmapratyayāḥ |
SA11n1129:264: sāmagri tu sattvasūcanā sā ca paramārthatu nopalabhyate ||
SA11n1129:266: na ca kaṇṭhagatā na tāluke akṣaraikaika tu nopalabhyate ||
SA11n1129:267: sāmagri pratītyataśca sā vāca manabuddhivaśena niścarī |
SA11n1129:271: yatha tantri pratītya dāru ca hastavyāyāmatrayebhi saṃgati |
SA11n1129:273: atha paṇḍitu kaści mārgate kuto'yamāgatu kutra yāti vā |
SA11n1129:274: vidiśo diśa sarva mārgataḥ śabdagamanāgamanaṃ na labhyate ||
SA11n1129:275: tatha hetubhi pratyayebhi ca sarvasaṃskāragataṃ pravartate |
SA11n1129:276: yogī puna bhūtadarśanāt śūnya saṃskāra nirīha paśyati ||
SA11n1129:277: skandhāyatanāni dhātavaḥ śūnya adhyātmika śūnya bāhyakāḥ |
SA11n1129:280: śūnyā anāmakā dharmāḥ nāma kiṃ paripṛcchasi |
SA11n1129:281: śūnyatā na kkaciddevā na nāgā nāpi rākṣasāḥ ||
SA11n1129:282: manuṣyā vāmanuṣyā vā sarve tu eṣa vidyate |
SA11n1129:283: nāmnā hi nāmatā śūnyā nāmni nāma na vidyate ||
SA11n1129:284: anāmakāḥ sarve dharmāḥ nāmnā tu paridīpitāḥ ||
SA11n1129:285: yo hi svabhāvo nāmno vai na sa dṛṣṭo na ca śrutaḥ |
SA11n1129:286: na cotpanno niruddho vā kasya nāmeha pṛcchasi ||
SA11n1129:288: ratnacitro hyayaṃ nāmnā [nāmnā] ratnottamaḥ paraḥ || iti ||
